answers.answer: Hi,It is possible, but it's also very possible that your blood sugar will go back to normal once thyroid levels are stabilized. Mine were very high a while ago, since RAI, and getting slowly stabilized I pretty much am normal with my blood sugar readings now, no dibaetic meds just watch my carbs, and take my synthroid...when I was hyper my glucose tests were inthe high 300's...

question: I was just wondering if anyone is Hashi/Hyper and has Diabetes?  Is this even possible?  If so, can you tell me about what went on with you?  Thanks in advance
title: Hashi/Hyper questions, please read
